class vqa_benchmarking_backend.bottomupattention.dataloader.transform_gen.ResizeShortestEdge(min_size, max_size, pixel_mean)¶

Bases: detectron2.data.transforms.TransformGen

Scale the shorter edge to the given size, with a limit of max_size on the longer edge. If max_size is reached, then downscale so that the longer edge does not exceed max_size.

get_transform(self, img)¶
